sys_ui_macro.name: chatgpt_form
sys_ui_macro.xml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null"> <style>#cancel_gpt_prompt {background-color: red; color: white;}</style> <style>#ready_for_processing {background-color: green; color: white;}</style> <style>#continue_conversation {background-color: green; color: white;}</style> <style>#latest_prompt {background-color: #2c778f; color: white;}</style> </j:jelly>
